Class NavigationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.NavigationView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class NavigationView
extends android.widget.ImageView
    Navigation view is used to indicate the direction to the destination.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens
